description:
List the metadata for all your selected 'Favorite' market datasets. The list makes it easy to get your favorite datasource and dataset names for use in any analytic report.
You can login to your your Sarus account to manage your favorite datasets by clicking here.

report_name: Load and display one daily dataset
description: Load and display the market data for one dataset.  This simple report can be used as a building block for all single dataset reports that you want to create.

report_name: Load a dataset as a monthly average and chart with two moving Averages
description: Load a dataset as a monthly average then chart and display it with two moving averags. You can easily change the dataset used, the moving averages and all other parameters.

report_name: Load and chart 2 datasets as daily and quarterly time series.
description: The report downloads two daily market data datasets (time series) as both daily and quarter year values. They are requested as business days only, filled forward ( using the 'interpolate' fill method) and with a common start date. Six charts are created to display both daily and quarterly values (defined in the 'Global Variables' section below).
